Uses of Class
pitt.search.semanticvectors.LuceneUtils

  • Packages that use LuceneUtils 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.viz
    Contains various classes for plotting results in two dimensions.

    • Uses of LuceneUtils in pitt.search.semanticvectors

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LuceneUtils TermVectorsFromLucene.getLuceneUtils()
      Returns the object's luceneUtils.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void IncrementalDocVectors.createIncrementalDocVectors(VectorStore termVectorData, FlagConfig flagConfig, LuceneUtils luceneUtils)
      Creates incremental doc vectors, getting everything it needs from a TermVectorsFromLucene object and a Lucene Index directory, and writing to a named file.
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBalancedBoundProductQueryVectorFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils2, String queryString) 
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQueryIntersectionFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils, String queryString)
      Method gets a query vector from a query string of the form: concept1*relation2+concept3*relation4 the resulting vector will be the intersection of the bound product of concept1 and relation 1, and the bound product of concept 2 and relation 2 (binaryvectors only for the moment)
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQueryVectorFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils, String queryString)

      Returns a vector representation containing both content and positional information
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getQueryVector(VectorStore vecReader, LuceneUtils luceneUtils, FlagConfig flagConfig, String[] queryTerms)
      Gets a query vector from an array of query terms.
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getQueryVectorFromString(VectorStore vecReader, LuceneUtils lUtils, FlagConfig flagConfig, String queryString)
      Method gets a query vector from a query string, i.e., a space-separated list of queryterms.
